728603f-b.title: Richmond: Bennett Street - Heberton Avenue
728603f-b.text:
Bennett Street, at and adjoining the N. W. corner
of Heberton Avenue, shoting the Port Richmond branch of
the New York Public Library (right) and the old J. Decker
mansion (Beers's 1874 map). The view is from Port Rich-
mond Park.
About 1905
By Mulford Simonson
From Staten Island Museum Collection through P. L. Sperr
(2)
The same location, vears later. The Scandinavian
Lutheran Church occupies the site of the old Decker
house.
May 28, 1927
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS
(3)
An additional view.
March 6, 1930
P. . Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS
